channel.title: earnings miss on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in earnings miss on FinanClub

item.title: NEM
item.description: score:6 Chances: Newmont receives clearance from regulatory authorities for acquisitions. Positive analysis of Newmont’s potential value and growth. Market edge highlights Newmont’s performance and potential. Strategic acquisitions and clearances enhance Newmont’s position. Upgrade to ‘Buy’ recommendation due to positive factors. Risks: Missed earnings estimates due to disruptions and higher costs.

item.title: LCID
item.description: score:20 Chances: Lucid announces plans for Gravity SUV reveal in November, potentially boosting interest. Lucid’s Air EV price cuts are well received by the market, indicating positive response. Lucid remains on track for annual production guidance of over 10,000 vehicles. Lucid strikes EV technology deal with Aston Martin, leading to partnership and stock jump.
